title: Issues after A11 update
content:
Since the update I continually experience the following, which are typically alleviated with a reboot for about 5 hours or so before returning (Pixel 4XL).

- Browser windows will individually show offline and won't refresh.  Copying the address and opening a new browser window fixes the issue for a bit.
- Approaching the phone no longer activates the screen.  
- Lifting no longer activates the screen.
- Facial unlock stops activating, going right to PIN entry.
- FPS while scrolling apps/websites/documents drops to 15 when used after being on charger while asleep.

That;'s about it atm.  Like I said, rebooting fixes most of the issues for a few hours before they return. Hoping someone gets this to the right hands so fixes can be made and patched.
